wikipedia_page.main: Jade Catherine Slack (3 May 1992 – 14 July 2002) was a ten-year-old British girl who died after swallowing five ecstasy tablets.

response: In July 2002 ten-year-old Jade Slack, who was visiting a friend in the village, died of a drug overdose. She took five ecstasy tablets, believing them to be sweets.(17 September 2003) "Couple cleared of killing Jade", BBC News, accessed 16 April 2015
